title: vinaiyODi viDumAru
sahitya:
vinaiyODi viDumAru tuNai purindiDuvAn anuvAvi malai mEvi amarum kumaran nam


anupallavi

  tuNai tEDit-tanai nADi tiraLAgak-kUDiDum anaivarukkum aruLai aLittuk-kaLippOn


caraNam    kurai tIrak-kazhalaDi kumbiDum anbar nirai vAzhvaip-perum perum pEru peruvar
varaiyillAmal koDai vazhangiDum vaLLal karuNaik-kaDal kATSi tarum aNNal
